name: WP-Record
author: Liontude

sections.description: Couple years ago, I entered to a post of a website which had a small audio player. This little thing gave me the possibility to hear what the post was doing while working on my tasks. So, I didn´t have to spend time reading. This is what makes WP-Record, so useful… and we are thinking about making it better with some new options that will be developed soon.
sections.installation:
Installing manually:

  1. Unzip all files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-record directory
  2. Log into WordPress admin and activate the ‘WP Record’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
  3. Go to any Page to start recording
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing manually:

  1. Unzip all files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-record directory
  2. Log into WordPress admin and activate the ‘WP Record’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
  3. Go to any Page to start recording

How do I use it?

Video
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

  • Basic version, record, list records and show in frontend.

short_description: Record the posts and play them in the front end
description: Couple years ago, I entered to a post of a website which had a small audio player. This little thing gave me the possibility to hear what the post was doing while working on my tasks. So, I didn´t have to spend time reading. This is what makes WP-Record, so useful… and we are thinking about making it better with some new options that will be developed soon.

upgrade_notice.0.1.0: Thanks for using WP-Record! This release includes first version.
